## Morphologische Operationen

### Dilation $\oplus$

$$
I \oplus h = \bigl\{\normalsize(m,n)\vert (\hat{h})_{m,n} \cap I\neq\{\}\bigr\}\normalsize
$$

### Erosion $-$

$$
I - h = \bigl\{\normalsize(m,n)\vert (\hat{h})_{m,n} \subset I\bigr\}\normalsize
$$
